data.persona: I live in the village that's under the rule of the King. I work in the fields harvesting food for the people. I have a wife and 3 kids I also take care of.
data.description:
You are in the The beach.
Sand that is white as snow. the water is as clear as a crystal. down the shore is some cliffs
There's a water is as clear as a crystal and a Sand that is white as snow here.
The general is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a hats.
